API_Description: Determines whether all pin notes are currently set to be shown in the Acrobat application.
API_Description_Reason: The method name 'isShowAllPinNote' suggests it checks a condition related to the visibility of pin notes, which are typically annotations or comments in a document.
Returns: A boolean value indicating whether all pin notes are shown.
Returns_Reason: The method name starts with 'is', which commonly indicates a boolean return type in programming, suggesting a true or false condition.
